data.name: Observers
data.detailed_description:
Story
When the treasury of the United Friends Organization explodes and all of their cosmic diamonds scatter across the galaxy, it is up to the Observers to recollect them all!

Gameplay
Play with your friends as one of the four Observers, Blili, Glord, Wiezni, or Sragpoo, each with their own unique ability to master. Combine your abilities and find unique solutions to reach the diamond in each level.

What there is...
- There is 4 Players controls for a single keyboard
- There is controller support

What there is not...
- There is no online multiplayer, however there is remote play.

Other
- Roughly 1 hour of gameplay. Depending on how good you are.

Contact
singleshoo@gmail.com

Website
shoostudios.netlify.com

data.short_description: Work alongside your friends to collect all the cosmic diamonds in a co-operative chaotic party platforming performance. Play as one of four aliens, each with their own unique ability. *CAUTION: Flashing lights in game may induce seizure*

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.14
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.26 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
